titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Thomas Wistar Brown (1826-1916) was the son of Moses and Mary Brown. Brown was president of the Haverford College Corporation, and vice-president of the Provident Life and Trust Co.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of receipts for goods and services purchased by Mr. and Mrs. T. Wistar Brown between 1886 and 1890. The collection includes receipts from grocers, pharmacists, clothing stores, confectioners, shoemakers, hotels, and other businesses. The collection also includes an 1889 letter to Mrs. T. Wistar Brown from one of her children.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
